summary.title: AI Solutions That Deliver Real Business Value
summary.subtitle: We help small and medium businesses implement AI that actually saves money and improves customer outcomes. No hype, just practical solutions that work.

cards.title: AI Strategy & Design
cards.description: Comprehensive AI roadmap including readiness assessment, strategy development, and custom solution design.

cards.title: AI Implementation
cards.description: End-to-end deployment of AI solutions with minimal disruption.

cards.title: AI Resources & Talent
cards.description: Access pre-vetted AI engineers, data scientists, and ML specialists.

cards.title: AI Support & Maintenance
cards.description: Keep your AI solutions running at peak performance with ongoing support.

cards.title: Cut Costs with AI
cards.description: Automate repetitive tasks and reduce operational overhead by up to 40%.

introOne.title: AI That Pays for Itself
introOne.html: We don't just implement AI for the sake of it. Every solution we deploy is designed to deliver measurable ROI - whether that's reducing manual work, cutting costs, or improving customer satisfaction.

introTwo.title: Built for Small Business
introTwo.html: Enterprise AI solutions often come with enterprise price tags. We specialize in making AI accessible to small and medium businesses, with solutions that scale with your needs and budget.

introPartner.title: Your Partner in AI Transformation
introPartner.html: Simplimate AI helps small and medium businesses harness the power of artificial intelligence. We believe AI isn't just for big corporations - businesses of all sizes can benefit from intelligent automation, predictive insights, and smarter operations.

introThree.title: Proven Results Across Industries
introThree.html: We've helped businesses transform their operations with AI solutions that deliver real, measurable outcomes. From healthcare to finance, retail to manufacturing, our team has the expertise to deliver results.

about.subtitle: Making AI accessible and practical for businesses of all sizes.
about.title: AI Consulting for the Mid-Market
about.html:
Simplimate AI was founded on a simple premise: AI shouldn't just be for large enterprises with massive budgets. Small and medium businesses deserve access to the same transformative technology.

With decades of experience in technology transformation, our team brings enterprise-grade AI capabilities to businesses of all sizes. We focus on practical, measurable solutions that deliver real ROI.

pricing.subtitle: We tailor our services to fit your needs and budget. Contact us to discuss how AI can transform your business.
pricing.title: Flexible Pricing for Every Business

staffing.title: Access Skilled AI Professionals
staffing.html:
Need AI talent for your projects? We provide access to pre-vetted AI engineers, data scientists, and ML specialists who can hit the ground running.

Whether you need short-term project support or long-term team augmentation, we have the talent to help you succeed.

delivery.title: End-to-End AI Implementation
delivery.html:
Our implementation team has extensive experience deploying AI solutions across various industries and use cases. We follow proven methodologies to ensure successful outcomes:

  • Discovery - Understanding your business processes and identifying AI opportunities

  • Design - Creating a tailored AI strategy and solution architecture

  • Development - Building and training custom AI models

  • Deployment - Integrating AI into your existing systems

  • Support - Ongoing maintenance and optimization

resourcingSummary.title: AI Talent When You Need It
resourcingSummary.subtitle: Access our network of skilled AI professionals. From data scientists to ML engineers, we provide the talent you need to power your AI initiatives.
